name: Spelling Words for 2nd Grade
description:
Know What's Inside - Safe Apps for kids Member
See how many spelling cards you can match to create a beautiful butterfly. Or fly with fire bug through 4 different worlds to find the words before the caterpillars can get them! Spelling Bug helps your child learn 2nd grade spelling words in 4 games with spectacular sound and fun graphics! Add your own words to match what you do in school.

All lessons and activities are designed using real second grade curricula and use common core state standards, so you can be sure these games will help give your child a boost in the classroom. And with helpful voice narration and exciting games, they won't want to stop playing and learning!

FEATURES
* Uses flash cards, memory games and puzzles, spelling bees and an exciting word shape game for hours of learning fun
* 4 worlds and 36 levels (first 5 levels in LITE Version) 100´s of words
* Add as many of your own words as you want (paid version only)!
* Adapts to kids' skills levels so it is always challenging and never too easy.
* Record your own voice
* See progress in the results tab
* Easy simple to navigate user interface
* COPPA compliant – NO ads, no personal detail is collected, no geolocation.
